channel.title: ...need help with my server
channel.description:
Hi, i need help wit my server, I used The Guardians tut, i used fr33scap3, and my server works. (Austin-fr33sc4p3, IP-192.168.1.104, Port-43594). Iam able to get on it with my comp (localhost) and my laptop, using the ip and port. but when i try to post it on moparscapes server status page, it says its offline. Anyone know what my problem is?
(P.S. - i called up my friend to see if he could get on it, but he couldnt either...)
HELP PLZ!!!!!
:(

item.title: ...need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @mr_pwnage_1 mr pwnage 1
item.description:
@mr_pwnage_1 wrote:

but when i get on it with my laptop, it workz, why not with other comps??

:([br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 09:47:07 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Jordanz Pk, post:2, topic:102601”]Well, server status page is always kinda… Well not working.

Alot of my friends who have no-ip’s always have trouble getting the server on to server status and they put in all the EXACT info and it never really works sorry but all I’m sayin is mabye try it later.[/quote]

Im sure what jordanz pk said was true, but i am able to connect on my laptop, using the ip…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 10:09:46 PM[/size][hr]OK, nvm, i forgot to turn on my server when my friend wuz trying to log in. rofl. sorry to waste yalls time :\

Read full topic
